title: Game is 50% bots? Nice one Riot .. *logs out*
body:
ARAMS are ridiculous on the weekends, 2 bots on my team, 3 on the other, next game roughly the same.

Cheers for easy S's but its boring af. Someone message me when there's more actual players than bots please, cheers.

replies.body: sometimes its not bots. there are a lot of people that troll the game

I played in the morning, saw bots.
Played in the afternoon, no bots.

If I queue when others are actually playing, I almost never see bots.
If anything it has gotten worse, I just played 2 games back to back where there was me and 1 player on the other team and 8 bots

I only play ARAM, and I get a bot in maybe 1/10 games.

Your ARAM elo is crap, so you get stuck with bots.
Win more games and you get away from them.

Only in early mornings, when few players are on, do I ever see multiple bots in ARAM.
i am actually abusing those bots for my hextech chests... rofl
Wait until you try Twisted Treeline!  kappa

League is dying.  Aram is the canary in the coal mine. 
Tencent are killing it (both the game and in the rejigged irl $ farming)
